
# Pull Request

## Description
<!-- Describe what you changed and why -->

## Related Issue
<!-- Link to the issue if there is one -->

## Type of Change
<!-- Check all that apply -->
- [ ] Bug fix (doesn't break existing functionality)
- [ ] New feature (adds functionality without breaking changes)
- [ ] Breaking change (changes existing behavior)
- [ ] Documentation update
- [ ] Security improvement
- [ ] Performance improvement

## Security
<!-- If your changes affect security, answer these -->
- Have you reviewed the [security policy](../security/policy)?
- Does this add new cryptographic operations?
- Any security implications?
- Did you add appropriate tests?

## Testing
<!-- What tests did you run? -->
- [ ] Unit tests
- [ ] Integration tests
- [ ] Security tests
- [ ] Manual testing

## Checklist
<!-- Check all that apply -->
- [ ] Code follows project style
- [ ] Added tests for changes
- [ ] All tests pass
- [ ] Updated documentation
- [ ] No new warnings
- [ ] Checked for security issues
- [ ] Verified encryption/decryption still works
